name: IOUserUSBSerial
desc: A service that manages a serial connection to a USB device.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the service for the specified provider.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the service that matches the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - initWith
items.desc: Initializes the private data structures associated with this class.

items.name: - HwActivate
items.desc: Opens the communication channel to the device.

items.name: - HwDeactivate
items.desc: Closes the communication channel to the device.

items.name: - handleRxPacket
items.desc: Processes the data received from the USB device.

items.name: - RxFreeSpaceAvailable
items.desc: Notifies your driver that buffer space is available for your device's data.

items.name: - TxDataAvailable
items.desc: Notifies your driver that the system has data for you to transmit to the device.

items.name: - handleInterruptPacket
items.desc: Processes an interrupt packet that originated from the device.

items.name: - ConnectQueues
items.desc: Creates and configures the buffers that store the data moving to and from the device.

items.name: - DisconnectQueues
items.desc: Releases the buffers that manage data moving to and from the device.
